message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This exceptional opportunity is designed to provide you with significant value and return on investment, considering its worth to you is $800000. We look forward to your positive response.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $800000. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to ensure it's within my budget.
